description: The Samastipur RTO (BR-33) is the primary transport regulatory authority for the Samastipur district in Bihar, operating under the Darbhanga administrative division. It facilitates essential services such as motor vehicle registration, issuance of driving licenses, and collection of road taxes to ensure safe transportation. The office's jurisdiction spans across numerous sub-divisions including Rosera, Patori, and Dalsinghsarai, enforcing the Motor Vehicles Act throughout the region.
address: District Transport Office, Collectoriate Building, Samastipur, Bihar
